description: Test suite for the HuggingFace agent integration, including various test cases for tool usage, streaming, asynchronous calls, and edge cases.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool invocation and response content verification.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response and tool call detection in stream.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool invocation and response verification.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool calls.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls within a single response.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tools invoked simultaneously and response content.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests invoking a custom tool function without parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests tool calls with list parameters, currently skipped.
